ComicInfo.Title: Best Laid Plans; The Gift, Part 2; Hare Pinned; Kill A Demon
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:10:19. [CVDB248382] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 20:23:45. [Issue ID 289197]

ComicInfo.Summary:
Best Laid Plans: A pair of mice prepare to have sex with cheese-flavored condoms.
The Gift, Part 2: With the help of James, the personal attendant of The Mistress, Amy begins to adapt to the household.
Hare Pinned: Professional wrestlers Bouncy Bunny and Mousie The Mangler find a unique way of defeating two intimidating challengers.
Kill A Demon: The Mink and Savage Squirrel team up to destroy Berecki.
